    • countVarInts

      public int countVarInts()
      Counts the number of varint values from the current buffer position until the end of the buffer. The current position remains unchanged. Useful when allocating an array prior to reading a series of values.
      Returns:
      the number of varints

    • readFixedIntNBO

      public int readFixedIntNBO() throws PbfException
      Reads a 32-bit integer in network byte order (big endian) -- this is not how fixed 32-bit values are encoded, use readFixed32 instead TODO: move out of this class, used only by OsmReader
      Throws:
      PbfException
